title: Former Dia 2 ADC LFT
body:
Hey,
my Name is Mike, I'm 24 y/o and I'm looking for an active 5s Ranked Team.
I'm from Germany, but my english is almost as good as my german.
I had a break for like 5 months, i gave away my old Main Account, but i decided to start playing again.
My current Division is Plat 5, i just played the Placements and went 10-0.

http://i.imgur.com/XuRStoP.png

I main ADC since Season 2, my most solid Champs are Vayne/Kalista/Corki/Trist/Kog, but i also perform well on every other ADC.
My strengths are mostly my mechanics. Other strenghts are f.e the understanding of the game, CS'ing positioning in Teamfights, and to know when to go all in to clean up.


Some Stats:

http://i.imgur.com/Y82Sejk.png
http://i.imgur.com/HJ8Khfx.png

I got Teamspeak and Skype

If you're interested to Trail/Add me to your team, add me ingame "**Bossgen v2**"

Greetings.
